content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for my apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] The final agreed-upon price was 1000 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of you renting your apartment to this person? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I would rate the likelihood of renting my apartment to this person as a 10.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
